DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Eye Assessment Interference Quantity 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to an assessment of a patient reported outcome on eyesight._The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to an assessment of a patient reported outcome on eyesight.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptons, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Concepts.definition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Property.preferredDefinition: The organ of sight or vision.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The organ of sight or vision.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.
A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: OAMFQ:Older Americans Resource Scale (OARS) Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire, Fillenbaum, G.G. & Smyer, M., 1981
